contentrichtext.text: {{merge to|Lantau Island|discuss=Talk:Lantau Island#Proposed merge with Gangzhou|date=April 2013}} {{Orphan|date=February 2013}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Distinguish|Guangzhou}} '''Gangzhou''' ({{Zh|c=碙州|p=Gāngzhōu}}) was a place in southern [[China]] (currently known as [[Lantau Island]] in [[Hong Kong]]) where [[Emperor Duanzong of Song China|Emperor Duanzong]] died and [[Emperor Bing of Song China|Emperor Bing]] was enthroned. {{Coord missing|People's Republic of China}} [[Category:Geography of China]] {{PRChina-geo-stub}}
